attributes.action: Re open Student Finance Uk with less staff so we can get assistance with loans
attributes.additional_details: Because suddenly they have stopped activity without giving any exact information of how they’re going to assist the students that were supposed to get their payments through these period of lockdown.
attributes.background: Open Student finance and carry on with the maintenance loan payments towards towards students.

rejection.details: Since you started this petition, we've confirmed that Student FInance England are open and dealing with inquiries.
